param.name: feature
param.dialogReference: <p/>The feature class to be converted to Places elements
param.pythonReference: <p/>The feature class to be converted to Places elements

param.name: translator
param.expression: Buildings | Generic | Parking Lots | Points of Interest | Roads | Trails | Other
param.dialogReference: <p/>The translator specifies how to filter and convert GIS features into Places elements.
param.pythonReference: <p/>The translator specifies how to filter and convert GIS features into Places elements.

param.name: output
param.dialogReference: <p/>The name of the file to create. It must not already exist. It typically has an extension of ".osm"
param.pythonReference: <p/>The name of the file to create. It must not already exist. It typically has an extension of ".osm"
